original_text: When the Pharisees saw this, they asked his disciples, “Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners?”
korean_text: 바리새인들이 보고 그의 제자들에게 이르되 어찌하여 너희 선생은 세리와 죄인들과 함께 잡수시느냐

sentences.original_text: Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너희 선생이 세리들과 함께 먹는가
